title: Abgeordnetenhaus State Parliament Berlin
tips: Avoid blowing out the highlights by watching the histogram or by taking multiple exposures

title: Amtsgericht Mitte County Court <Mitte=
tips: There is a guarded gate including a full body scan. Ask friendly for permission and explain
yourself (I am a hobby photographer and interested in the architecture)
This is a court please keep that in mind and act accordingly
Keep a low profile and respect any instructions given
This area is usually crowded so be patient and wait for the perfect moment

title: Bierpinsel
tips: This building is in the middle of the road in a busy area. Watch out for pedestrians and cars

title: Brandenburger Tor Brandenburg Gate
hours: event like a concert or marathon
tips: For a clean shot visit as early as possible ideally during summer when the sun rises early
The sun rises behind the gate twice a year around March 20th and September 22nd
This area is crowded during daytime so be patient and wait for the perfect moment
Take your time to walk around the building and explore various angles
